alert.note: Alert for Gasconade; Montgomery (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:16PM CDT until May 09 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Missouri River at St. Charles. Missouri River at Hermann. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Missouri River at Hermann. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.3 feet, The southern end of School House Road south of Rhineland begins flooding near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Saturday was 23.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 12.0 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Missouri River Hermann 21.0 21.6 20.3 18.6 18.5 16.1 13.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
